channel.title: PSFL... adventures
channel.description: rss feed of adventures posted on psfla!

item.description: (panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: green guy: start getting Plaster test stuff ready
item.description: yeah that sounds like a good idea! ...you should probably let max know what you're doing first, though
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: okay. yeah. guess we gotta do this again
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: (panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
(panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)

Okay. Well.
It seems like it's been a long day for you. Let's just get you tested, and get you to a cot. We can talk when you wake up.
Okay?

...ok
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: no...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: ...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Perhaps you should ask where your going?
item.description:
hey i probably should have asked this earlier but um
where are you taking me?

You're riding with us 'till our next stop. After I stopped for my pager, I saw you floating out there. I couldn't just... leave you.
We won't get to a stopping point for a while, though.

...You still have your pager?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
(panel is not an image, thus will not be shown) you're... moving, at least
it's going by so fast that you can't really make out what's to the truck's side!
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: you turn around, and look outside the window
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Take a good look out the window, and try to get an idea of where you are
item.description:
(panel is not an image, thus will not be shown) you... are going to do that! really soon!!!


...
got it

don't wanna be too hasty though
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
(panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)

If too many of their germs get into your system, you'll lose control of your body.
At least, that's my theory. We don't have any studies on Plasters. Or at least any that the AAC have released...
All I know is that they're wicked smart, and wicked vicious.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
Plasters are... these goop things.
They look like us. But they don't really act like us.
They walk a little different... Talk a little different... Bite a little different...
They're similar to zombies, if that makes sense.
Smart zombies.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: ask about plasters
item.description:
um...
what's a plaster?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
Inspiring sound, we're only supposed to honk our horns when something goes horribly wrong.
Like when a truck is heavily damaged. Or when a Plaster gets in.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: . . .
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: Despite our horns'...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
(panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)

The AAC has these... interesting horns installed onto every AAS truck.
They're supposed to incite peoples' love for the company. It's motivational, or something. They're supposed get you to work harder. Or to get you to buy more stuff from the AAC, if you don't work for one of their subsidiaries... I guess.

It doesn't really work that way in practice, though.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: (panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
Uh. Yeah.
I'm not going to honk the horn, though. It'll scare everyone in the back.
I'll just play the sound here.

Also, my name's Max. Don't call me "trucker guy", alright?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Luna: Ask Max to honk the horn, but the horn is a strange invention of science fiction, yet still a truck horn
item.description:
uh
hey
trucker guy?
can you honk the horn, and have the horn be a strange invention of science fiction

while still being a truck horn

...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: [START OF CHAPTER 1]
item.description:
(panel is not an image, thus will not be shown) your name is luna. you don't know who you are, you don't know what you're on, and you don't know where you're going.

what do you do?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: (panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: Kay, yeah, let's get going.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: (panel is not an image, thus will not be shown)
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Grab her by her scarf(?) and bring her in!
item.description: yyyoink!
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: max: address your monitor. get your ass out of there!
item.description: you can't just leave her there.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: retrieve arms from the trucker's glovebox.
item.description: after the stunt you just pulled? no way.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: But why the hell are you all the way out here?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
It's...
fine.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
hey i'm sorry about earlier
i really don't know what came over me :/
i really should have given your pager back right off the bat
it wont happen again
i hope
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: apologize and give him the pager
item.description:
you happilly oblige!
well. on second thought. obliging happilly would probably seem weird to him, seeing as you were previously deceitful
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Consider returning the pager to it's rightful owner
item.description:
you know what, that's a good idea!

you aren't sure why you hadn't thought of this sooner
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
I know you have my pager, kid.
It's embarrassingly obvious.

It's almost to a point where I can't tell if this is supposed to be a joke or not.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Conjure a mediocre deus ex machina
item.description:
how is SHE supposed to bring someone in!!! she just woke up!!!!!!!!!!

you're putting a ton of stress on her :(
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: he's not impressed.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: now hide it QUICK
item.description: oh yeah. you hide it so damn fast.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: hide it somewhere using misdirection
item.description:
HEY LOOK
ITS THE WHITE DOT!!!!!!!! LOOK AT IT!!!!!!!!!
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: i think he noticed what you have
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
so um
your kids have to deal with you being gone
like their other mom has to teach them to cook
and has to provide for them all herself
or i guess their other parent in your case
or hell you could also not have a partner
or kids
that would be cool too
kids suck am i right haha
im 15 i don't know why i'm talking about kids

man. you sure are hamming it up!
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Talk to the truck driver
item.description:
you start talking to the truck driver. about... anything your mind goes to, really.


so um you know when uh
you get a big giant thing and it wants to shoot you
so you're like "ah no don't kill me!!!!!!!!!"
and you run away really realyl fast
but then the robot thing catches up and points its evil evil gun at youand
you're like "WHAT NO I DON'T WANT TO DIE!!!!!! PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!! :("
but then it shoots you and you're dead.

you might be panicking.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
uh.
why exactly did you do that?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: girl if you don't bang on that truck door
item.description: fine FINE!!!! you bang on the door...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: bang on truck door
item.description: you aren't sure you want to do that... trucks are scary...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: oh. uh.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: USE THE PAGER!! TRUCKS ARE SCARY!!!
item.description: use the pager??? how???? pagers cant send out
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: stick and all, huh...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: oh! uh. there it is.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: look around for source of pager
item.description: you look around to try and find out where the pager came from, but
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Do something super silly!
item.description: YEAHHH YEAH YEAH!!!!!!!!! YAYYYY :D
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
hm. seems like someone lost their pager

you hope this isn't the pager that was lost... from what you can remember, pagers were really important! they let creatures alert each other about threats within a local area quickly, and are also useful for learning things about new places

if someone wants this pager back, you'll be in a real bind.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: and successfully GRAB it!
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Luna grab that thang.
item.description: you float your way over to grab that SOMETHANG...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: looks like SOMETHING is drifting your way.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Okay but doesn't EVERYONE like beef?
item.description:
vegans. think about the vegans.
how the hell did you forget about vegans.
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Attempt to recall interests. They are your first and foremost priority.
item.description:
hm... from what you can remember, you have a general fascination with computers. and...
um...
you probably liked beef...?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description:
your name is luna! you come from vatta, a planet known for its bustling economy and supermodern technology.
you... presumably have interests? it feels like you should be remembering more than you are right now... those damn antivacancy shots aren't working after all!

right. it looks like you're in space right now... what are you going to do about that?
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: yeah! that's your name!
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: Your name was... Luna, right?
item.description: yeah... now that you mention it, that name feels right...
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.title: begin
item.description:
aw... you've been ejected in your sleep, after trying to escape the collapse of your homeworld. it seems your dreams of finding a new, habitable shelter have been halted...

what's your name again? it seems i've forgotten it
item.dc:creator: rosefloase

item.description: this adventure is rated WEB 14 for mild swearing, elements of body horror, and more to come. flashing lights are also present
item.dc:creator: rosefloase
